timeline.message: Send explanation every two second and add temporary display for assessment
Merge branch 'feature/modeling-exercise/explanation' of github.com:ls1intum/Artemis into feature/modeling-exercise/explanation
Fix compilation error and change string checks
Change comment of update submission function
Add tests for modeling exam components
Fix style errors and remove duplication

timeline.bodyText: Why is this necessary? I thought detectChanges already takes care of "stabilising" the component.
timeline.author: FrankeLukas

replies.bodyText: Without it textarea value does not get updated, I believe it is related to FormsModule.
replies.author: iozbeyli

timeline.bodyText: Not a big deal but this is not necessary as detectChanges will call ngOnInit.
timeline.author: stefanwaldhauser
